metadata.name: Analog Binary Code: (non)fungible
metadata.description:
A unique visual poem coded in maitake and turkey tail mushroom capsules. Documentation as looping mp4 plus photographic triptych (three giclee prints in  12" x 12" gallery frames) and etched lidded glass jar containing the materials used to create the poem. This NFT should accompany the physical elements. 

Part of the ongoing Analog Binary Code series by poet, artist and AI researcher Sasha Stiles, whose work with text and technology explores what it means to be human in a nearly posthuman world -- merging biological and mechanical, physical and digital, ancient and futuristic in explorations of human-machine connection and transcendent possibility.
